Name: Jaime Del Socorro
description:
Jaime, age 37 and the father of three children, is passionate about agriculture. He plants corn and beans. He was assisted by a loan from Kiva that he used for the purchase of top quality agricultural supplies, and he was very grateful.

He has opted for a loan with Kiva, together with MiCr√©dito, for the purchase of two heifers and compost for his crops, so that in this way he can have better harvests.
